analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin du byed pa'o //
translated: He acts in accordance with the words of all tathāgatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras kyi thu bo'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras kyi thu bo'o //
translated: He is the eldest son of the tathāgatas.

original: sems can 'dul ba'i khro bo'i rgyal po'o //
analyzed: sems can 'dul ba'i khro bo'i rgyal po'o //
translated: He is the wrathful king who tames beings.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur zhing byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur zhing byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
translated: He is empowered and blessed by all tathāgatas.”

original: de bas na khyed rnams 'di'i dam tshig la gnas par byos shig ces so //
analyzed: de bas na khyed rnams 'di'i dam tshig la gnas par byos shig ces so //
translated: Therefore, you should abide by his sacred pledge.”

original: de nas de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then they said this:

original: bdag cag gi srog yal ba las bskyab tu gsol //
analyzed: bdag cag gi srog yal ba las bskyab tu gsol //
translated: “Please protect us from the loss of our lives!

original: bdag cag kyang de bzhin du bgyid cing mchis so //
analyzed: bdag cag kyang de bzhin du bgyid cing mchis so //
translated: We will do the same.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Blessed One said:

original: kye grogs po rnams 'di nyid la skyabs su dong shig /'di nyid kyis kun du skyobs kyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: kye grogs po rnams 'di nyid la skyabs su dong shig /'di nyid kyis kun du skyobs kyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin no //
translated: “Oh friends, take refuge in him alone! He alone will protect you, not anyone else.”

original: de nas srid pa gsum gyi bdag po de rnams bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje 'dzin pa de ga la ba der logs su bltas nas nyam thag pa'i sgra chen po mgrin gcig tu byung nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas srid pa gsum gyi bdag po de rnams bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje 'dzin pa de ga la ba der logs su bltas nas nyam thag pa'i sgra chen po mgrin gcig tu byung nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then those lords of the three existences, looking in the direction of the Blessed Vajrapāṇi, with one voice let out a great cry of distress and said this:

original: bcom ldan 'das 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal 'di las kun du bskyab tu gsol /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal 'di las kun du bskyab tu gsol /
translated: “Blessed One, please protect us from this suffering of death!”

original: de nas phyag na rdo rjes kye ma rungs pa rnams nga'i bstan pa la zhugs shig / rdo rje 'bar ba 'dis gcig tu 'bar bar byas nas thams cad brlag par byas sa re /
analyzed: de nas phyag na rdo rjes kye ma rungs pa rnams nga'i bstan pa la zhugs shig / rdo rje 'bar ba 'dis gcig tu 'bar bar byas nas thams cad brlag par byas sa re /
translated: If you do not, I will burn you all to ashes with this blazing vajra!”

original: de dag gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to//
analyzed: de dag gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to//
translated: They replied, “

original: khyod ni kun du bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sems bskyed pa kun du dul ba /
analyzed: khyod ni kun du bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sems bskyed pa kun du dul ba /
translated: You are Samantabhadra, the one who has generated the mind of all the tathāgatas, the one who has completely subdued the mind,

original: sems can thams cad la phan par bzhed pa /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la phan par bzhed pa /
translated: the one who wishes to benefit all sentient beings,

original: sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa stsol ba lags na /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa stsol ba lags na /
translated: the one who grants fearlessness to all sentient beings.

original: ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag bsreg par 'gyur /
analyzed: ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag bsreg par 'gyur /
translated: Why, O Blessed One, would you burn us?”🔽Then Vajrapāṇi said, “For the sake of purifying the minds of wicked sentient beings like you, I will make you take my pledge.

original: de nas phyag na rdo rjes bos nas khyed lta bu'i sems can ma rungs pa rnams sems sbyang pa'i phyir nga'i dam tshig la mnos shig / gal te mi gnas na da dung gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas phyag na rdo rjes bos nas khyed lta bu'i sems can ma rungs pa rnams sems sbyang pa'i phyir nga'i dam tshig la mnos shig / gal te mi gnas na da dung gnas par bya'o //
translated: If you do not remain, I will make you remain!”

original: gsol ba de bzhin du bgyi'o //
analyzed: gsol ba de bzhin du bgyi'o //
translated: They replied, “We will do as you say!”

original: de nas phyag na rdo rjes dbang phyug chen po ma gtogs pa gzhan dag dbugs @66a * //
analyzed: de nas phyag na rdo rjes dbang phyug chen po ma gtogs pa gzhan dag dbugs @66a * //
translated: Then Vajrapāṇi, having comforted and revived all except Maheśvara,

original: dbyung zhing bslang ba'i snying po 'di smras so //
analyzed: dbyung zhing bslang ba'i snying po 'di smras so //
translated: recited this essence of comfort and revival:🔽“Oṃ tiṣṭha vajra.”

original: aom tishtha badzra de smras ma thag tu dbang phyug chen po ma gtogs pa de thams cad brgyal ba las sems dbugs phyung ste /
analyzed: aom tishtha badzra de smras ma thag tu dbang phyug chen po ma gtogs pa de thams cad brgyal ba las sems dbugs phyung ste /
translated: As soon as he said this, all except Maheśvara, having been revived from their swoon,

original: lha'i bde ba myong zhing bag tsha ba dang ba spu longs pa med par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la blta zhing longs so //
analyzed: lha'i bde ba myong zhing bag tsha ba dang ba spu longs pa med par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la blta zhing longs so //
translated: experienced the bliss of the gods and, free from fear and with their hair standing on end, looked at and enjoyed Lord Vajrapāṇi.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the Blessed One said to Vajrapāṇi:

original: sems dpa' chen po lha'i bdag po lha chen po 'di ma bslangs par 'di'i srog chud gsan na ci rung /
analyzed: sems dpa' chen po lha'i bdag po lha chen po 'di ma bslangs par 'di'i srog chud gsan na ci rung /
translated: “Great being, if you do not revive this lord of gods, this great god, and let his life force be lost, what will happen?

original: 'di gsos na 'di yang skyes bu dam par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di gsos na 'di yang skyes bu dam par 'gyur ro //
translated: If you revive him, he will become a holy being.”

original: de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin du bya'o snyam nas shi ba slong ba'i snying po 'di smras so /
analyzed: de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin du bya'o snyam nas shi ba slong ba'i snying po 'di smras so /
translated: Then Vajrapāṇi, thinking, “So it shall be,” recited this essence of reviving the dead:

original: aom badzra a'a yu de nas 'di smras ma thag lha chen po'i bdag po shi ba las sos te ldang bar 'dod na ldang bar ma nus so /
analyzed: aom badzra a'a yu de nas 'di smras ma thag lha chen po'i bdag po shi ba las sos te ldang bar 'dod na ldang bar ma nus so /
translated: As soon as he said this, the great lord of gods, who had been dead, rose up, but was unable to stand.

original: de nas lha chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas lha chen pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the great lord of gods said to the Lord:

original: ci bdag cag 'di lta bus 'dul lam /
analyzed: ci bdag cag 'di lta bus 'dul lam /
translated: “Are we to be disciplined in this way?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: ” The Lord said:

original: khyod skyes bu chen po 'di'i bka' nyan par mi 'jug na /
analyzed: khyod skyes bu chen po 'di'i bka' nyan par mi 'jug na /
translated: “If you do not obey the word of this great being,

original: khyod 'dul ba 'di nyid yin gyi nga ni ma yin no //
analyzed: khyod 'dul ba 'di nyid yin gyi nga ni ma yin no //
translated: this is your discipline, not mine.”

original: dbang phyug chen pos gsol pa /
analyzed: dbang phyug chen pos gsol pa /
translated: Maheśvara said:

original: ci bcom ldan 'das khyed kyis ma rungs pa'i sems can 'di las skyabs mdzad mi spyod dam /
analyzed: ci bcom ldan 'das khyed kyis ma rungs pa'i sems can 'di las skyabs mdzad mi spyod dam /
translated: “Will the Lord not protect us from this wicked being?

original: bka' stsal pa ;
analyzed: bka' stsal pa ;
translated: ” The Lord said:

original: ngas 'di la bskyab par mi nus so //
analyzed: ngas 'di la bskyab par mi nus so //
translated: “I cannot protect you from him.”

original: gsol ba ci'i slad du /
analyzed: gsol ba ci'i slad du /
translated: He asked: “Why not?

original: bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bka' stsal pa /
translated: ” The Lord said:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: “Because he is the lord of all tathāgatas.”

original: gsol pa / bka' stsal pa'i don de ma 'tshal te /
analyzed: gsol pa / bka' stsal pa'i don de ma 'tshal te /
translated: He asked: “I do not understand the meaning of what you have said.

original: khams gsum pa'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las gzhan pa'i bdag po mchis par ma 'tshal na 'di su lags /
analyzed: khams gsum pa'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las gzhan pa'i bdag po mchis par ma 'tshal na 'di su lags /
translated: I do not know of any lord other than the Tathagatas, the lords of the three worlds. Whose is this?

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes yang lha chen po la bos te 'di skad gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes yang lha chen po la bos te 'di skad gsungs so //
translated: Then the Bodhisattva Vajrapani, calling out to Mahesvara, said this:

original: kye ma rungs pa nga'i bka' mi nyan nam /
analyzed: kye ma rungs pa nga'i bka' mi nyan nam /
translated: Oh, you wicked one, do you not listen to my words?

original: de nas lha chen pos rdo rje sems dpa'i tshig thos nas 'khrug cing khros par gyur te ;
analyzed: de nas lha chen pos rdo rje sems dpa'i tshig thos nas 'khrug cing khros par gyur te ;
translated: Then Mahesvara, hearing the words of Vajrasattva, became agitated and angry.

original: de ltar 'gyel bzhin du yang 'jigs pa chen po'i gzugs bstan te /
analyzed: de ltar 'gyel bzhin du yang 'jigs pa chen po'i gzugs bstan te /
translated: Even while falling, he displayed a form of great fear

original: 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: and said this:

original: nga shi ba bzod kyi khyod kyi ngag mi nyan to //
analyzed: nga shi ba bzod kyi khyod kyi ngag mi nyan to //
translated: I can endure death, but I will not listen to your words.

original: de nas phyag na rdo rjes rab tu khros par gyur par bstan cing rang gi rkang pa'i mthil nas rjes su spyod pa 'di phyung ngo //
analyzed: de nas phyag na rdo rjes rab tu khros par gyur par bstan cing rang gi rkang pa'i mthil nas rjes su spyod pa 'di phyung ngo //
translated: Then Vajrapani, displaying great wrath, brought forth this follower from the soles of his feet:

original: aom ta ka ri sha na badzra h'um de @66b nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthil nas kun du 'bar ba'i snying po khro gnyer byas la mche ba lhag ger byas pa /
analyzed: aom ta ka ri sha na badzra h'um de @66b nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthil nas kun du 'bar ba'i snying po khro gnyer byas la mche ba lhag ger byas pa /
translated: Oṃ, Taker of the life-force of Vajra!🔽Then, from the sole of the Lord’s foot, a great face of Vajra-Anu-Yoga arose, blazing with a mass of wrathful frowns and bared fangs.

original: gdong chen po rdo rje'i rjes su spyod pa byung nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i spyan snga na bka' nod cing 'dug bar gyur to //
analyzed: gdong chen po rdo rje'i rjes su spyod pa byung nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i spyan snga na bka' nod cing 'dug bar gyur to //
translated: It stood before the Lord Vajrapāṇi, waiting for his command.

original: de nas phyag na rdo rjes dbang phyug chen po sbyang ba 'di skad ces gsungs so //
analyzed: de nas phyag na rdo rjes dbang phyug chen po sbyang ba 'di skad ces gsungs so //
translated: Then Vajrapāṇi spoke this purification of Maheśvara:

original: aom pa ta ka ri sha ya /
analyzed: aom pa ta ka ri sha ya /
translated: Oṃ, Pāṭaka-kariṣaya!

original: sarba dha ra badzra dha ra /
analyzed: sarba dha ra badzra dha ra /
translated: Sarva-dhara vajra-dhara!🔽Anu-caṭakaṭa vajra hūṃ jaḥ!

original: aa nu tsa ra ka ta ka ta badzra h'um dza: de nas de skad smras pa dang / lha chen po dang au mar bcas te rkang pa gyen kar gcer bur phyung ste /
analyzed: aa nu tsa ra ka ta ka ta badzra h'um dza: de nas de skad smras pa dang / lha chen po dang au mar bcas te rkang pa gyen kar gcer bur phyung ste /
translated: Then, when this was said, Maheśvara and Umā were pulled out naked and with upturned feet.

original: skye bo thams cad kyis gad mo bgad cing rkang pas bkug pas rdo rje'i rjes su spyod pa bkug ste /
analyzed: skye bo thams cad kyis gad mo bgad cing rkang pas bkug pas rdo rje'i rjes su spyod pa bkug ste /
translated: All the people laughed, and with their feet they pulled out Vajra-Anu-Yoga.

original: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar zhabs kyi drung du gzhag go /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar zhabs kyi drung du gzhag go /
translated: He was placed in front of the Blessed Vajrapāṇi, at his feet.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the bodhisattva Vajrapāṇi said to the Blessed One,🔽“What should be done with this wicked being, who is so arrogant?” The Blessed One said, “Vajra karma!”

original: sems can ma rungs pa mchis brang du bcas pa 'di la ci ltar bgyi bcom ldan 'das kyis badzra karma ho zhes bka' stsal pa dang / de nas phyag na rdo rjes lha chen po zhabs g-yon pas mnan /
analyzed: sems can ma rungs pa mchis brang du bcas pa 'di la ci ltar bgyi bcom ldan 'das kyis badzra karma ho zhes bka' stsal pa dang / de nas phyag na rdo rjes lha chen po zhabs g-yon pas mnan /
translated: Then Vajrapāṇi pressed down on the great god with his left foot,

original: zhabs g-yas pas au ma'i steng du mnan nas /
analyzed: zhabs g-yas pas au ma'i steng du mnan nas /
translated: and with his right foot he pressed down on Umā.

original: rang gi snying po smras pa /
analyzed: rang gi snying po smras pa /
translated: He uttered his essence mantra:

original: aom badzra a'a be sha ha na pra ta na trat /
analyzed: aom badzra a'a be sha ha na pra ta na trat /
translated: Oṃ vajra āveśa hana pratānta traṭ

original: de nas de smras ma thag tu lha chen po la babs nas rang gi lag pa stong gis rang gi gdong pa stong 'tshog go //
analyzed: de nas de smras ma thag tu lha chen po la babs nas rang gi lag pa stong gis rang gi gdong pa stong 'tshog go //
translated: As soon as he said this, the great god fell down and with his thousand hands he covered his thousand faces.

original: de nas rdo rje nor bu las grub pa'i lha'i khang khyim phyi rol na gnas pa'i srid pa gsum thams cad kyis nged kyi dbang po 'di bdag nyid chen po des btul lo zhes sgra cher phyung ngo //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje nor bu las grub pa'i lha'i khang khyim phyi rol na gnas pa'i srid pa gsum thams cad kyis nged kyi dbang po 'di bdag nyid chen po des btul lo zhes sgra cher phyung ngo //
translated: Then, from the jewel created by the vajra, a divine palace appeared outside of which the three worlds proclaimed, “This lord of ours has been subdued by that great being.”

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha chen po la thugs rje chen po bskyed de /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha chen po la thugs rje chen po bskyed de /
translated: Then the Blessed One generated great compassion for the great god.

original: aom buddha mee tri badzra raksha ham zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: aom buddha mee tri badzra raksha ham zhes gsungs so //
translated: He said, “Oṃ buddha maitri vajra rakṣa haṃ.”

original: de gsungs ma thag tu lha chen po la babs pa'i sdug bsngal de kun zhi ste /
analyzed: de gsungs ma thag tu lha chen po la babs pa'i sdug bsngal de kun zhi ste /
translated: As soon as he said that, all the suffering that had befallen the great god was pacified.

original: yang phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs mthil gyis reg pas na bde ba dang / bla na med pa grub pa'i dbang dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa dang / gzungs dang / mngon par shes pa rnams thob nas /
analyzed: yang phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs mthil gyis reg pas na bde ba dang / bla na med pa grub pa'i dbang dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par thar pa dang / gzungs dang / mngon par shes pa rnams thob nas /
translated: Then, by the touch of Vajrapāṇi’s foot, he attained bliss, the empowerment of supreme accomplishment, and the dhāraṇīs, liberations, samādhis, and higher knowledges.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du grub pa'i bar du gyur to //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du grub pa'i bar du gyur to //
translated: He attained the state of a tathāgata.

original: de nas lha chen po la bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs mthil gyis reg pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / rnam par thar pa'i bde ba myong ste /
analyzed: de nas lha chen po la bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs mthil gyis reg pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / rnam par thar pa'i bde ba myong ste /
translated: Then, the Bhagavat touched the great god with the sole of his foot, and he experienced the bliss of the samadhi, dharani, and liberation doors of all tathagatas.

original: lha chen po'i lus zhabs la phul bas na dpa' bo'i gdan no //🔽lha chen po des yang 'og gi 'jig rten gyi @67a * //
analyzed: lha chen po'i lus zhabs la phul bas na dpa' bo'i gdan no // lha chen po des yang 'og gi 'jig rten gyi @67a * //
translated: Since the great god offered his body to the foot, it is the hero's seat.

original: khams gang'a'i klung sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten khams las 'das pa na thal bas khebs pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der thal ba'i dbang po'i dbyangs zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par skyes so //
analyzed: khams gang'a'i klung sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten khams las 'das pa na thal bas khebs pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams der thal ba'i dbang po'i dbyangs zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs par skyes so //
translated: That great god was born as the tathagata called Bhasadhipatikirti in the world system called Bhasacchannana, beyond world systems equal to the sands of thirty-two Ganges rivers below this world system.

original: gdan de las bzhengs nas ni //
analyzed: gdan de las bzhengs nas ni //
translated: Having arisen from that seat,

original: zhes bya ba ni rgyud 'di bshad par bzhed pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni rgyud 'di bshad par bzhed pa'o //
translated: he is said to have wished to explain this tantra.

original: dgyes shing rdo rje gsor nas kyang //
analyzed: dgyes shing rdo rje gsor nas kyang //
translated: Delighted, he brandished the vajra

original: zhes bya ba ni dgyes shing ni de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dgyes shing ni de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs te /
translated: means that, delighted, the tathagata blessed the vajra.

original: rgyud 'di'i don ston par dgyes pa'o //
analyzed: rgyud 'di'i don ston par dgyes pa'o //
translated: He is pleased to teach the meaning of this Tantra.

original: rdo rje ni rig pa ste ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rdo rje ni rig pa ste ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The vajra is knowledge, the nature of the five intuitions.

original: gsor ba ni phrin las so //
analyzed: gsor ba ni phrin las so //
translated: To brandish it is to act.

original: rgyud phyi ma 'di'i don ston par byed ces pa'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rgyud phyi ma 'di'i don ston par byed ces pa'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is that he teaches the meaning of this Later Tantra.

original: sh'akya ni sh'akya dbang po'i nyi ma'i rigs can yin la /
analyzed: sh'akya ni sh'akya dbang po'i nyi ma'i rigs can yin la /
translated: The Shakya is the Shakya king, who is of the solar race.

original: bdag po ni khams gsum gyi bdag po'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: bdag po ni khams gsum gyi bdag po'i tha tshig go //
translated: The lord is the lord of the three worlds.

original: dgyes mdzad pa ni rgyud kyi don ston pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dgyes mdzad pa ni rgyud kyi don ston pa'i phyir ro //
translated: To be pleased is to teach the meaning of the Tantra.

original: thub pa'i gtso la phyag 'tshal nas //
analyzed: thub pa'i gtso la phyag 'tshal nas //
translated: Having bowed to the chief of the sages,

original: zhes pa la /
analyzed: zhes pa la /
translated: Here is the commentary.

original: thub pa ni lus ngag yid gsum mo //
analyzed: thub pa ni lus ngag yid gsum mo //
translated: The sage is the body, speech, and mind.

original: gtso la ni rkang gnyis thams cad kyi'o //
analyzed: gtso la ni rkang gnyis thams cad kyi'o //
translated: The chief is the best of the two-legged.

original: de yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: de yang gsungs pa /
translated: It is also said:

original: rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod gshegs 'tshal /
analyzed: rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod gshegs 'tshal /
translated: You, chief of the two-legged, are about to go.

original: zhes pa'o // phyag 'tshal nas zhes ba ni ya rabs gong ma'i tshul dang sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes pa'o // phyag 'tshal nas zhes ba ni ya rabs gong ma'i tshul dang sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Having bowed is to generate the qualities of the body, speech, and mind of the former superiors.

original: des ni ston pa'i rang bzhin dang gleng gzhi bstan pa'o //
analyzed: des ni ston pa'i rang bzhin dang gleng gzhi bstan pa'o //
translated: This explains the nature of the teacher and the introduction.

original: da 'di nas nang sems kyi dkyil 'khor dang / sbyor ba dang po dang / las rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin bstan te /
analyzed: da 'di nas nang sems kyi dkyil 'khor dang / sbyor ba dang po dang / las rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin bstan te /
translated: Now, from here on, the inner maṇḍala of the mind, the first union, and the samādhi of the supreme royal activity are explained.🔽Having entered the samādhi called the vajra of the complete purification of all obscurations,

original: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas zhes bya ba la sgrib pa ni lnga ste /
analyzed: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas zhes bya ba la sgrib pa ni lnga ste /
translated: the five obscurations are as follows:

original: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags te /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags te /
translated: The obscuration of affliction is the latent tendencies of conceptuality.

original: de yang las kyi sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pa dang / skye ba'i sgrib pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa dang lnga ni thams cad do //
analyzed: de yang las kyi sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / rnam par smin pa'i sgrib pa dang / skye ba'i sgrib pa dang / shes bya'i sgrib pa dang lnga ni thams cad do //
translated: Furthermore, the five—the obscuration of karma, the obscuration of phenomena, the obscuration of ripening, the obscuration of birth, and the obscuration of the knowable—are all obscurations.

original: rnam par dag pa ni gnyen po ye shes kyi stobs kyis mi mthun pa zil gyis gnon pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par dag pa ni gnyen po ye shes kyi stobs kyis mi mthun pa zil gyis gnon pa ste /
translated: Complete purification is the suppression of the discordant by the power of the wisdom of the antidote.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rdo rjes thams cad 'joms pa dang 'dra bas na nyon mongs pa'i mtshan ma thams cad 'joms pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rjes thams cad 'joms pa dang 'dra bas na nyon mongs pa'i mtshan ma thams cad 'joms pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it destroys all the signs of afflictions, like a vajra destroys everything.

original: ting nge 'dzin ni de'i ngang las mi ldan zhing 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin ni de'i ngang las mi ldan zhing 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Samādhi is the state of not being separated from that, and holding it.

original: snyoms par zhugs pa ni gnyis su med par zhugs pa dang / mi mnga' bar snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: snyoms par zhugs pa ni gnyis su med par zhugs pa dang / mi mnga' bar snyoms par zhugs pa'o //
translated: Entering into union is entering into nonduality, and entering into union without possessing.

original: de'i don yang 'di ltar snyegs te /
analyzed: de'i don yang 'di ltar snyegs te /
translated: The meaning of that is sought in this way.

original: @67b bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes thugs kar nang sems kyi 'khor lo bskyed nas spro bar bya'o //
analyzed: @67b bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes thugs kar nang sems kyi 'khor lo bskyed nas spro bar bya'o //
translated: The Bhagavān Vajrapāṇi generates the inner mind wheel in the heart and emanates it.

original: de yang kun du bzang po byang chub kyi sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su /
analyzed: de yang kun du bzang po byang chub kyi sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su /
translated: Moreover, in the center of the maṇḍala of the moon of bodhicitta, Samantabhadra

original: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzra h'um phat ces pa la sogs pa'i sngags las rdzogs pa'i tshul du sh'akya thub pa'i dkyil 'khor bskyed nas /
analyzed: aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzra h'um phat ces pa la sogs pa'i sngags las rdzogs pa'i tshul du sh'akya thub pa'i dkyil 'khor bskyed nas /
translated: is generated in the manner of perfection from the mantra oṃ sarvapāpaṃ dahana vajra hūṃ phaṭ, and the maṇḍala of Śākyamuni is generated.

original: stong gsum gyi 'jig rten du khyab pas sems can gyi khams gsum gyi sgrib pa snga ma bzhin du sbyangs nas byin gyis brlabs te /
analyzed: stong gsum gyi 'jig rten du khyab pas sems can gyi khams gsum gyi sgrib pa snga ma bzhin du sbyangs nas byin gyis brlabs te /
translated: Since it pervades the three-thousandfold world systems, it purifies the realms of sentient beings of the three realms, just as before, and it blesses them.🔽Having conferred empowerment in the inner mandala of the mind, it establishes them on the path of liberation.

original: nang sems kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur nas rnam par grol ba'i lam la bzhag pas ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs pas na de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: nang sems kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur nas rnam par grol ba'i lam la bzhag pas ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs pas na de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: Since it enters into meditative equipoise on that samādhi, it is called that.

original: da ni ma 'ongs pa'i sems can gyi don du ngan song sbyong ba zhes pa'i rang gi snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs ka nas byung ngo zhes bya ba ni gsungs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: da ni ma 'ongs pa'i sems can gyi don du ngan song sbyong ba zhes pa'i rang gi snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs ka nas byung ngo zhes bya ba ni gsungs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: Now, for the sake of future sentient beings, this essence of his mind called Purifying the Lower Realms arose from his heart.

original: da ni sbyor ba dang po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi don ston te /
analyzed: da ni sbyor ba dang po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi don ston te /
translated: Now, the meaning of the samādhi of the first application is taught.

original: rjes su 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pas ni dang por sprul pa'i sku'i rigs bcom ldan 'das gsung sh'akya thub pa'i bzlas pa dang / bsgrub par 'dod pa des ji ltar brtag pa'i yid du 'ong ba'i gnas der sdom pa gsum la gnas pas khrus byas la 'dug ste /
analyzed: rjes su 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor pas ni dang por sprul pa'i sku'i rigs bcom ldan 'das gsung sh'akya thub pa'i bzlas pa dang / bsgrub par 'dod pa des ji ltar brtag pa'i yid du 'ong ba'i gnas der sdom pa gsum la gnas pas khrus byas la 'dug ste /
translated: The yogi who is a follower, who wishes to accomplish the recitation and practice of the Bhagavat, the nirmāṇakāya of the Śākya Sage, should, in a place that is pleasing to the mind, as imagined, abide in the three vows, bathe, and sit.

original: dang por mtshams kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas par bya ste /
analyzed: dang por mtshams kyi ting nge 'dzin la gnas par bya ste /
translated: First, one should abide in the samādhi of the boundary.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mdun du dmigs nas de dag la rigs kyi phyag bzhi byas te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mdun du dmigs nas de dag la rigs kyi phyag bzhi byas te /
translated: Visualizing the tathāgatas in front, one should prostrate with the four limbs to the family.

original: mchod pa dang sdom pa la sogs pa la gnas par byas pas dang por chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i sngags kyis stong par byin gyis brlabs nas /
analyzed: mchod pa dang sdom pa la sogs pa la gnas par byas pas dang por chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i sngags kyis stong par byin gyis brlabs nas /
translated: Abiding in the offerings, vows, and so on, first bless the space with the mantra of pure phenomena.

original: de nas rdo rje dril bu'i sngags dang phyag rgyas sdig pa dral te /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje dril bu'i sngags dang phyag rgyas sdig pa dral te /
translated: Then, with the mantra and mudra of the vajra and bell, one should tear apart the sins.

original: de nas ye shes dbab par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas ye shes dbab par bya'o //
translated: Then one should bring down the awareness.

original: de nas mngon par byang chub pa lnga bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas mngon par byang chub pa lnga bsgom par bya ste /
translated: Then one should meditate on the five manifest enlightenments.

original: de yang ji ltar bsgom par bya zhe na sems so sor rig pa las mngon par byang chub pa dang / sems bskyed pa las mngon par byang chub pa dang / chos kyi sku las mngon par byang chub pa dang / de nyid brtan par byas pa las mngon par byang chub pa dang /
analyzed: de yang ji ltar bsgom par bya zhe na sems so sor rig pa las mngon par byang chub pa dang / sems bskyed pa las mngon par byang chub pa dang / chos kyi sku las mngon par byang chub pa dang / de nyid brtan par byas pa las mngon par byang chub pa dang /
translated: There is manifest enlightenment from awareness of the mind, manifest enlightenment from the generation of the mind, manifest enlightenment from the dharmakāya, manifest enlightenment from stabilizing that,

original: sku phyag rgya chen po las mngon par byang chub pa'o //
analyzed: sku phyag rgya chen po las mngon par byang chub pa'o //
translated: and manifest enlightenment from the great seal of the body.

original: de la sems so sor rig pa las mngon par byang chub pa ni /
analyzed: de la sems so sor rig pa las mngon par byang chub pa ni /
translated: Among those, manifest enlightenment from awareness of the mind is

original: 'di nyid las kyang /
analyzed: 'di nyid las kyang /
translated: as stated in this tantra:

original: chos rnams thams cad dngos med par //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad dngos med par //
translated: All phenomena are unreal,

original: sems kyis bsgom par bya ba ni //🔽aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam //
analyzed: sems kyis bsgom par bya ba ni // aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam //
translated: and should be meditated on by the mind.

original: zhes @68a * //
analyzed: zhes @68a * //
translated: One should contemplate the moon mandala from a.

original: gsungs pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: gsungs pa'i phyir na /
translated: Therefore,

original: dang por stong pa las sems so sor rig pa ste phyi'i yul du gyur pa 'di dag dbang po las 'das pa phung po rnam par dag pa gzung 'dzin spangs pa dbang po drug gi spyod yul du yang ma gyur pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du
analyzed: dang por stong pa las sems so sor rig pa ste phyi'i yul du gyur pa 'di dag dbang po las 'das pa phung po rnam par dag pa gzung 'dzin spangs pa dbang po drug gi spyod yul du yang ma gyur pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid du
translated: First, one should meditate on the characteristic of emptiness, the mind that is aware of itself from emptiness, these external objects that are beyond the sense faculties, the pure aggregates, free from subject and object, not even the domain of the six sense faculties.

original: bsgom mo // nang 'dzin pa'i sems kyi mtshan nyid ni dngos po'i mtshan ma dang bral ba rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo /
analyzed: bsgom mo // nang 'dzin pa'i sems kyi mtshan nyid ni dngos po'i mtshan ma dang bral ba rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo /
translated: The characteristic of the inner apprehending mind is free from the signs of entities, the essence of natural luminosity.

original: aa zhes pa las a'a li yi ge bcu gnyis su snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bcu gnyis kyi rang bzhin stong pa bcu drug gi rang bzhin las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par bsgom mo //
analyzed: aa zhes pa las a'a li yi ge bcu gnyis su snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bcu gnyis kyi rang bzhin stong pa bcu drug gi rang bzhin las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par bsgom mo //
translated: From the syllable a, the twelve vowels appear as the nature of the twelve stages of the tathāgatas, and from the nature of the sixteen emptinesses, one should meditate on the form of the moon maṇḍala.

original: de yang rgyud chen po las /
analyzed: de yang rgyud chen po las /
translated: Moreover, in the great tantra:

original: gang 'di zla ba rdzogs pa ni //
analyzed: gang 'di zla ba rdzogs pa ni //
translated: This perfect moon

original: dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med //
analyzed: dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med //
translated: is pure, clear, and unclouded.

original: de bzhin tshogs ni rdzogs pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de bzhin tshogs ni rdzogs pa'i phyir //
translated: Likewise, because the accumulations are perfected,

original: sems ni zla ba rgyas pa 'dra //
analyzed: sems ni zla ba rgyas pa 'dra //
translated: the mind is like a full moon.

original: zhes gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa yin no //
translated: This is the meaning of the above passage.

original: de skyed par byed pa'i sngags ni /
analyzed: de skyed par byed pa'i sngags ni /
translated: The mantra that generates that is:

original: aom tsitta pra ti be dham ka ro mi zhes pa'o //
analyzed: aom tsitta pra ti be dham ka ro mi zhes pa'o //
translated: Om citta-prativedham karomi.

original: de nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bya ste ;
analyzed: de nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bya ste ;
translated: Then generate the thought of awakening.

original: aom bo dhi tsitta autp'a da y'a mi zhes brjod pas /
analyzed: aom bo dhi tsitta autp'a da y'a mi zhes brjod pas /
translated: Om bodhicitta utpadayamayi.

original: aa de las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams kyi rgyu 'bras kyi nyon mongs pa rnams bcom sbyangs te /
analyzed: aa de las 'od zer phyogs bcur 'phros pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams kyi rgyu 'bras kyi nyon mongs pa rnams bcom sbyangs te /
translated: From that ah, light rays shine in the ten directions, destroying and purifying the afflictions of cause and effect of sentient beings in the worlds of the great trichiliocosm.

original: slar 'dus nas aa la thim pas de nyid dang k'a li sum cu skar ma'i rnam pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i gzugs gnyis pa nyid du gyur to //
analyzed: slar 'dus nas aa la thim pas de nyid dang k'a li sum cu skar ma'i rnam pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i gzugs gnyis pa nyid du gyur to //
translated: They reabsorb and dissolve into the ah, which becomes a second great moon mandala in the form of the thirty vowels.

original: de yang gsungs pa /
analyzed: de yang gsungs pa /
translated: It is said:

original: zla ba'i dbus su zla ba yi //
analyzed: zla ba'i dbus su zla ba yi //
translated: In the middle of the moon,

original: dkyil 'khor gnyis pa mthong ba yin //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gnyis pa mthong ba yin //
translated: a second moon mandala is seen.

original: zhes so // de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su chos kyi yi ge hr'i: zhes bya ba bzhag ste /
analyzed: zhes so // de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i dbus su chos kyi yi ge hr'i: zhes bya ba bzhag ste /
translated: Then, in the middle of that moon mandala, place the letter hrīḥ, the letter of the dharma.

original: de'i mtha' ma na tshur aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzra h'um phat de'i mtha' na gong gi sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de'i mtha' ma na tshur aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzra h'um phat de'i mtha' na gong gi sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang ldan pa'o //
translated: At the end of that, there is oṃ sarva pāpaṃ dahana vajra hūṃ phaṭ. At the end of that, there is the sound-syllable as above.

original: aom tishtha badzra padma zhes brjod pas de 'phros 'dus pa las yi ge'i phreng ba 'od du zhu sngags la thim /
analyzed: aom tishtha badzra padma zhes brjod pas de 'phros 'dus pa las yi ge'i phreng ba 'od du zhu sngags la thim /
translated: By reciting oṃ tiṣṭha vajra padma, that syllable string melts into light and dissolves into the mantra.

original: sngags kyi phreng ba 'od du zhu bas dbus kyi hr'i: la thim /
analyzed: sngags kyi phreng ba 'od du zhu bas dbus kyi hr'i: la thim /
translated: The mantra string melts into light and dissolves into the hṛiḥ in the center.

original: hr'i: 'od du zhu nas 'dus shing ldem par gyur pa las /
analyzed: hr'i: 'od du zhu nas 'dus shing ldem par gyur pa las /
translated: The hṛiḥ melts into light and gathers into a mass.

original: rdo rje dang padmar gyur par bsgom mo //
analyzed: rdo rje dang padmar gyur par bsgom mo //
translated: Meditate that it becomes a vajra and lotus.

original: de yang thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin rdo rje dang padma'o //
analyzed: de yang thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin rdo rje dang padma'o //
translated: Moreover, the vajra and lotus are the nature of method and wisdom.

original: padma ni gsung gi rigs kyi rtags kyi phyag rgya ste thabs so //
analyzed: padma ni gsung gi rigs kyi rtags kyi phyag rgya ste thabs so //
translated: The lotus is the symbolic mudra of the speech family and is the method.

original: rdo rjer bsgoms pas kyang rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dmigs su med pas gsungs te /
analyzed: rdo rjer bsgoms pas kyang rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dmigs su med pas gsungs te /
translated: Also, by meditating on the vajra, Vairocana and so on are nonreferential.

original: de @68b yang ;
analyzed: de @68b yang ;
translated: That is also

original: / padma thabs kyi rang bzhin te //
analyzed: / padma thabs kyi rang bzhin te //
translated: the lotus is the nature of method,

original: stong pa nyid ni rdo rjer bshad //
analyzed: stong pa nyid ni rdo rjer bshad //
translated: and emptiness is explained as the vajra.

original: ces so // de nas yang ye shes kyi 'od zer 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dbyings thams cad bsdus nas rdo rje padma la thim par bya ste /
analyzed: ces so // de nas yang ye shes kyi 'od zer 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i dbyings thams cad bsdus nas rdo rje padma la thim par bya ste /
translated: Then, again, wisdom light rays shine forth, gather the entire realm of the vajra body, speech, and mind of all tathāgatas of the world systems of the ten directions, and dissolve into the vajra and lotus.

original: aom badzra a'atma ko& ham zhes brjod pas brtan par byas so //
analyzed: aom badzra a'atma ko& ham zhes brjod pas brtan par byas so //
translated: Then, saying oṃ vajra ātmāko ’haṃ, one stabilizes.🔽Also, it is said:

original: de yang // dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i dbus su ni //
analyzed: de yang // dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i dbus su ni //
translated: In the center of the second maṇḍala,

original: rdo rje chen po rnam bsams la //
analyzed: rdo rje chen po rnam bsams la //
translated: one should imagine a great vajra.

original: yud tsam so sor brtags pa ni //
analyzed: yud tsam so sor brtags pa ni //
translated: The moment of examination

original: theg pa chen por brtags pa yin //
analyzed: theg pa chen por brtags pa yin //
translated: is the examination of the Mahāyāna.

original: zhes gsungs pas brtag par byas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pas brtag par byas pa'o //
translated: Thus, one should examine.🔽Again, from that, a subtle tathāgata form emanates and reabsorbs.

original: yang de las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku phra mo 'phros 'dus pa las aom ya th'a sarba ta th'a ga t'a sta tha ham zhes brjod pa las /
analyzed: yang de las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku phra mo 'phros 'dus pa las aom ya th'a sarba ta th'a ga t'a sta tha ham zhes brjod pa las /
translated: Saying oṃ yathā sarvatathāgatās tathāhaṃ,

original: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i sku phyag rgya chen por gyur te bzhugs so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i sku phyag rgya chen por gyur te bzhugs so //
translated: the Bhagavat Śākyamuni’s form becomes the great seal and remains.

original: yang de nyid kyi thugs kar kun du bzang po byang chub kyi sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gong gi sngags de nyid phreng ba'i tshul du bkod la /🔽de las 'od 'phros pas rigs bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa bsdus nas slar 'dus pa las gnas bzhir thim ste snying gar ni aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du h'um las rdo rje khar ni hr'i: las padma🔽/ dpral bar sva las rin po che zur gsum pa /
analyzed: yang de nyid kyi thugs kar kun du bzang po byang chub kyi sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du gong gi sngags de nyid phreng ba'i tshul du bkod la / de las 'od 'phros pas rigs bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa bsdus nas slar 'dus pa las gnas bzhir thim ste snying gar ni aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du h'um las rdo rje khar ni hr'i: las padma / dpral bar sva las rin po che zur gsum pa /
translated: Furthermore, at his heart is Samantabhadra, the mind of enlightenment, on a moon mandala, with the above mantra arranged in the form of a garland.

original: spyi bor ham las rdo rje rgya gram bsgom mo //
analyzed: spyi bor ham las rdo rje rgya gram bsgom mo //
translated: Light radiates from that, gathers the inconceivable blessings of the tathāgatas of the four families, and reabsorbs. It dissolves into the four places: At the heart, from a, a moon mandala, and upon that, from hūṃ, a vajra; at the forehead, from traṃ, a variegated lotus; at the throat, from jriṃ, a jewel; and at the crown, from khaṃ, a variegated vajra cross.

original: yang 'phro 'du byas pas nam mkha' las yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dbu la bskon pa las dbus su rnam par snang mdzad byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya can thim /
analyzed: yang 'phro 'du byas pas nam mkha' las yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dbu la bskon pa las dbus su rnam par snang mdzad byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya can thim /
translated: Again, through the emanation and reabsorption of light, a precious wish-fulfilling jewel is placed on the head. Vairocana dissolves into the center, with the mudra of supreme enlightenment.

original: shar du mi bskyod pa glang po che'i steng nas gnon gyi phyag rgya can thim /
analyzed: shar du mi bskyod pa glang po che'i steng nas gnon gyi phyag rgya can thim /
translated: In the east, Akṣobhya, with the mudrā of suppression, dissolves from atop an elephant.

original: rigs phyi ma yang de bzhin thim mo //
analyzed: rigs phyi ma yang de bzhin thim mo //
translated: The later families also dissolve in the same way.

original: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sh'akya'i rgyal po zhes bdag la rdo rje'i ming gi dbang bskur bar bsam mo //
analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sh'akya'i rgyal po zhes bdag la rdo rje'i ming gi dbang bskur bar bsam mo //
translated: Then, think that one is empowered with the vajra name “Śākya King of All Tathāgatas.”

original: sh'akya thub pa de yang sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
analyzed: sh'akya thub pa de yang sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
translated: That Śākyamuni sits in the bodhisattva posture.

original: phyag g-yon na padma dmar po bsnams pa g-yas bstod pas 'byed pa kha dog gser btso ma'i mdog lta bur gnas pa /
analyzed: phyag g-yon na padma dmar po bsnams pa g-yas bstod pas 'byed pa kha dog gser btso ma'i mdog lta bur gnas pa /
translated: In the left hand he holds a red lotus, and with the right hand he makes the gesture of praise. He is the color of refined gold.

original: rdo rje dang padma 'dab ma gyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dod chags rnam par dag cing mi chags pa'i ngo bo nyid du blta bas lta bar bdag nyid bsgoms te /
analyzed: rdo rje dang padma 'dab ma gyes pa'i tshul gyis 'dod chags rnam par dag cing mi chags pa'i ngo bo nyid du blta bas lta bar bdag nyid bsgoms te /
translated: One should meditate on oneself as the view, seeing the vajra and lotus in the manner of open petals, the nature of pure passion, free of attachment.🔽The mantra is yathā-oṃ vajra-dharma-aṣṭa-aham.

original: sngags ya th'a badzra dharm'ashta aa ham de nas byin gyis brlabs te sa ma ya stvam zhes pa 'di brjod @69a * //
analyzed: sngags ya th'a badzra dharm'ashta aa ham de nas byin gyis brlabs te sa ma ya stvam zhes pa 'di brjod @69a * //
translated: Then, having empowered oneself, one should recite this: samaya-satva.

original: pas rgyab tu zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bsam mo //
analyzed: pas rgyab tu zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bsam mo //
translated: Imagine that the light of the moon disk behind him fills the entire sky.

original: de nas de'i dbus su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms te /
analyzed: de nas de'i dbus su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms te /
translated: Then, in the center of that, meditate on a sun disk.

original: sngags ni aom badzra s'urya aom de nas rang nyid kyi snying gar aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du lha nyi shu rtsa gcig rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis bskyed de /
analyzed: sngags ni aom badzra s'urya aom de nas rang nyid kyi snying gar aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du lha nyi shu rtsa gcig rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis bskyed de /
translated: The mantra is Oṃ vajra sūrya oṃ. Then, in your heart, from āḥ, imagine a moon disk. Upon that, generate the twenty-one deities in complete form.

original: yang de'i dbus su sh'akya thub pa bdag nyid ci 'dra ba zhig bskyed nas de rnams kyi thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du bha ga wa te'i sngags ring /
analyzed: yang de'i dbus su sh'akya thub pa bdag nyid ci 'dra ba zhig bskyed nas de rnams kyi thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du bha ga wa te'i sngags ring /
translated: Then, in the center of that, generate Śākyamuni just like yourself. In the heart of each of those, upon a moon disk, is the long mantra of Bhagavat.

original: de'i steng du rang rang gi rtsa ba'i sngags rnams bsams pa la /
analyzed: de'i steng du rang rang gi rtsa ba'i sngags rnams bsams pa la /
translated: Upon that, imagine the individual root mantras.

original: de las 'od 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad la phog pas sdig sgrib thams cad sbyangs khyad par du yang ngan song gsum la phog pas /
analyzed: de las 'od 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad la phog pas sdig sgrib thams cad sbyangs khyad par du yang ngan song gsum la phog pas /
translated: Light radiates from those and strikes all sentient beings in the worldly realms of the ten directions, purifying all their negativities and obscurations. In particular, it strikes the three lower realms.

original: ngan song gsum po'i aom da ha da ha zhes pa la sogs pa dang / aom pa tsa pa tsa zhes pa dang / aom ma tha ma tha zhes pa la sogs pas sdig pa sbyangs so //
analyzed: ngan song gsum po'i aom da ha da ha zhes pa la sogs pa dang / aom pa tsa pa tsa zhes pa dang / aom ma tha ma tha zhes pa la sogs pas sdig pa sbyangs so //
translated: Om Pacha Pacha and so forth, and Om Mathu Mathu and so forth.

original: aom bhri ta bhri ta dang / aom tr'a ta tr'a ta zhes bya ba dang / bi dra ba bi dra ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags kyis ni lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgrib pa sbyangs nas sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
analyzed: aom bhri ta bhri ta dang / aom tr'a ta tr'a ta zhes bya ba dang / bi dra ba bi dra ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags kyis ni lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgrib pa sbyangs nas sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
translated: By the mantra Om Bhrut Bhrut and so forth, Om Tara Tara and so forth, and Vidrava Vidrava and so forth, the obscurations of body, speech, and mind are purified, and one is empowered into the enlightened body, speech, and mind.

original: de nas de dag nye 'khor du bkug nas //
analyzed: de nas de dag nye 'khor du bkug nas //
translated: Then, having summoned them to the vicinity,

original: aom badzra aa dhi tishtha dzny'a na sa ma ya h'um gis gnas nyi shur byin gyis brlabs so //
analyzed: aom badzra aa dhi tishtha dzny'a na sa ma ya h'um gis gnas nyi shur byin gyis brlabs so //
translated: they are empowered into the twenty places by Om Vajra Adhisthanajñana Samaya Hum.

original: de nas nang sems kyi dkyil 'khor du bcug ste /
analyzed: de nas nang sems kyi dkyil 'khor du bcug ste /
translated: Then, having entered into the inner mind mandala,

original: dbang bskur bas rnam par grol ba'i lam thob par byas te /
analyzed: dbang bskur bas rnam par grol ba'i lam thob par byas te /
translated: they are empowered, and the path of liberation is attained.

original: phyir snying ga nas phyung ste nor bu dri ma med pa'i steng du 'khod de mchod pa bsam kyis mi khyab pas mchod do //
analyzed: phyir snying ga nas phyung ste nor bu dri ma med pa'i steng du 'khod de mchod pa bsam kyis mi khyab pas mchod do //
translated: Having emerged from the heart, they are seated on the stainless jewel and are worshipped with inconceivable offerings.

original: de nas khams gsum gyi lha klus kyang mchod nas bstod pa dang / yon tan bsngags pa gong ltar brjod do //
analyzed: de nas khams gsum gyi lha klus kyang mchod nas bstod pa dang / yon tan bsngags pa gong ltar brjod do //
translated: Then, the gods and nagas of the three realms also make offerings and praise them, expressing the above-mentioned qualities and praises.

original: de nas de dag gnas su dong ngo ;
analyzed: de nas de dag gnas su dong ngo ;
translated: Then, they return to their own places.

original: / de nas nang sems kyi dkyil 'khor de la bstod pas bstod de phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: / de nas nang sems kyi dkyil 'khor de la bstod pas bstod de phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Then, the inner mind mandala is praised with praises and prostrations.

original: de nas rang gi lus la gnas nyi shu rtsa gcig tu lha nyi shu rtsa gcig po lus la gsal bar blta zhing brtag go //
analyzed: de nas rang gi lus la gnas nyi shu rtsa gcig tu lha nyi shu rtsa gcig po lus la gsal bar blta zhing brtag go //
translated: Then, in the twenty-one places in one's body, the twenty-one deities are clearly seen and examined.

original: de ni sbyor ba dang po dang nang sems kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rim pa'o /
analyzed: de ni sbyor ba dang po dang nang sems kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rim pa'o /
translated: That is the first yoga and the sequence of the inner mind mandala.

original: // / da ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin ston to //
analyzed: // / da ni dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog gi ting nge 'dzin ston to //
translated: Now, the supreme king of mandalas is taught.

original: de yang dang por chos nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i ngang las /
analyzed: de yang dang por chos nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i ngang las /
translated: Moreover, first, from within the meditation on emptiness, the nature of phenomena,

original: dang por 'og gi phyogs su yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor /
analyzed: dang por 'og gi phyogs su yam las rlung gi dkyil 'khor /
translated: below, from yāṃ, is the wind mandala.

original: de'i steng du lam las gser gyi sa gzhi /
analyzed: de'i steng du lam las gser gyi sa gzhi /
translated: Upon that, from laṃ, is a golden ground.

original: de'i steng du bam las chu'i rgya mtsho //
analyzed: de'i steng du bam las chu'i rgya mtsho //
translated: Upon that, from baṃ, is an ocean of water.

original: de'i steng du pam las padma 'dab ma brgyad pa rtsa ba gser gyis gzhi la zug pa /
analyzed: de'i steng du pam las padma 'dab ma brgyad pa rtsa ba gser gyis gzhi la zug pa /
translated: Upon that, from paṃ, is an eight-petaled lotus with its stem sunk into the golden ground.

original: @69b gser gyi rus sbal la brten nas rtsa ba chu srin chen po'i sos bzung ba /
analyzed: @69b gser gyi rus sbal la brten nas rtsa ba chu srin chen po'i sos bzung ba /
translated: The stem is supported by a golden tortoise and held by the jaws of a great crocodile.

original: de'i padma'i sdong po la yi ge bra /
analyzed: de'i padma'i sdong po la yi ge bra /
translated: The stem of the lotus is marked with the syllable bhrūṃ.

original: de'i padma'i ge sar la sum las rin po che'i ri rab rtse mo bzhi par gyur /
analyzed: de'i padma'i ge sar la sum las rin po che'i ri rab rtse mo bzhi par gyur /
translated: In the center of the lotus, from suṃ, is a precious Mount Meru with four peaks.

original: de'i steng du h'um las rdo rje rgya gram rtse mo gnyis dang ldan pa /
analyzed: de'i steng du h'um las rdo rje rgya gram rtse mo gnyis dang ldan pa /
translated: Upon that, from hūṃ, is a crossed vajra with two prongs.

original: de yang shar dkar po /
analyzed: de yang shar dkar po /
translated: It is white in the east,

original: lho sngon po /
analyzed: lho sngon po /
translated: blue in the south,

original: nub dmar po ;
analyzed: nub dmar po ;
translated: red in the west,

original: byang ljang gu /
analyzed: byang ljang gu /
translated: green in the north,

original: dbus rin po che'i mig mang ris su bris pa /
analyzed: dbus rin po che'i mig mang ris su bris pa /
translated: and in the center, it is a checkerboard of precious stones.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang mnyam pa zhig bsgom pa'i steng du /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang mnyam pa zhig bsgom pa'i steng du /
translated: Meditate on that as vast as the inconceivable buddha realms.

original: bhr'um las gzhal yas khang gru bzhi pa bsgo bzhi pa rta babs dang sgo khyung du ldan pa la /
analyzed: bhr'um las gzhal yas khang gru bzhi pa bsgo bzhi pa rta babs dang sgo khyung du ldan pa la /
translated: The celestial mansion arises from bhruṃ. It is square with four doors and four pediments.

original: tva ra na dang chu srin gyis brgyan pa la /
analyzed: tva ra na dang chu srin gyis brgyan pa la /
translated: It is adorned with toraṇas and makara.

original: de'i dbus su gsar gyi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa /
analyzed: de'i dbus su gsar gyi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa /
translated: In the center of that is a new eight-spoked wheel.

original: 'khor lo yang lte ba dang / rtsibs dang mu khyud gsum yod de /
analyzed: 'khor lo yang lte ba dang / rtsibs dang mu khyud gsum yod de /
translated: The wheel has a center, spokes, and a rim.

original: lte bas ni nyon mongs pa sbyangs /
analyzed: lte bas ni nyon mongs pa sbyangs /
translated: The center purifies afflictions.

original: rtsibs brgyad kyis ni sdug bsngal rnams sbyong /
analyzed: rtsibs brgyad kyis ni sdug bsngal rnams sbyong /
translated: The eight spokes purify suffering.

original: mtha' ma'i mu khyud kyis ni las rnams sbyong ba ste /
analyzed: mtha' ma'i mu khyud kyis ni las rnams sbyong ba ste /
translated: The outer rim purifies karma.

original: de yang dbus 'khor lor 'dug pa ni rten 'brel bcu gnyis sbyong ba'o //
analyzed: de yang dbus 'khor lor 'dug pa ni rten 'brel bcu gnyis sbyong ba'o //
translated: Moreover, the wheel in the center purifies the twelve links of dependent origination.

original: de ji ltar sbyong zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar sbyong zhe na /
translated: How is that purified?

original: rten 'brel yang nyon mongs pa dang / sdug bsngal dang las gsum du 'dus la /
analyzed: rten 'brel yang nyon mongs pa dang / sdug bsngal dang las gsum du 'dus la /
translated: Dependent origination is included in the three: afflictions, suffering, and karma.

original: 'khor lo yang lte ba dang mu khyud dang rtsibs gsum du 'dus so //
analyzed: 'khor lo yang lte ba dang mu khyud dang rtsibs gsum du 'dus so //
translated: The wheel is also included in the three: center, rim, and spokes.

original: de lta bu'i 'khor lo de'i lte ba'i dbus su seng ge bzhi'i khri /
analyzed: de lta bu'i 'khor lo de'i lte ba'i dbus su seng ge bzhi'i khri /
translated: In the center of that wheel is a lion throne.

original: de'i steng du sna tshogs padma ;
analyzed: de'i steng du sna tshogs padma ;
translated: On top of that, a multicolored lotus.

original: de'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
analyzed: de'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
translated: On top of that, a moon maṇḍala.

original: de'i steng du h'um dang hr'i: de'i mtha' ma na tshur aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzra h'um phat /🔽ces bya bas bskor ba /🔽de las 'od 'phro ba dang bsdu ba las padma dang rdo rje ste padma 'dab ma brgyad gyen du bltas pa brgyad thur du bltas pa /
analyzed: de'i steng du h'um dang hr'i: de'i mtha' ma na tshur aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzra h'um phat / ces bya bas bskor ba / de las 'od 'phro ba dang bsdu ba las padma dang rdo rje ste padma 'dab ma brgyad gyen du bltas pa brgyad thur du bltas pa /
translated: On top of that, hūṃ and hriḥ, with oṃ sarva pāpaṃ dahana vajra hūṃ phaṭ around the edge.🔽Light radiates from that and returns, becoming a lotus and a vajra.

original: rigs dang thabs dang snying rje'i cha 'dzin pa ;
analyzed: rigs dang thabs dang snying rje'i cha 'dzin pa ;
translated: The eight upward-facing petals are the aspect of method, and the eight downward-facing petals are the aspect of compassion.

original: de'i steng du rdo rje ste so sor brtags pa'i shes rab kyi rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi cha 'dzin pa ste /
analyzed: de'i steng du rdo rje ste so sor brtags pa'i shes rab kyi rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi cha 'dzin pa ste /
translated: On top of that is the vajra, which is the aspect of emptiness, the nature of discerning wisdom.

original: de las 'od zer spros pas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sku gsung thugs kyi dbyibs thams cad bsdus nas thim pas de la skur gyur pa'i rkyen aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzra h'um phat ces brjod pa dang / phyag na rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya las sh'akya thub pa'i skur gyur to //
analyzed: de las 'od zer spros pas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sku gsung thugs kyi dbyibs thams cad bsdus nas thim pas de la skur gyur pa'i rkyen aom sarba p'a pam da ha na badzra h'um phat ces brjod pa dang / phyag na rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya las sh'akya thub pa'i skur gyur to //
translated: From the gesture of the wheel in the hand of Vajrapāṇi, the body of Śākyamuni is generated.

original: 'dir ni sngags 'dis bskyed do //
analyzed: 'dir ni sngags 'dis bskyed do //
translated: Here, it is generated by this mantra.

original: rdo rje gtsug tor gyi rgyud kyi sgrub thabs su ni mu ne mu ne zhes bya ba la sogs pa las bskyed do //
analyzed: rdo rje gtsug tor gyi rgyud kyi sgrub thabs su ni mu ne mu ne zhes bya ba la sogs pa las bskyed do //
translated: In the sādhana of the Vajroṣṇīṣa Tantra, it is generated from muṇe muṇe and so on.

original: da ni 'khor gyi sku bskyed de /
analyzed: da ni 'khor gyi sku bskyed de /
translated: Now, the bodies of the retinue are generated.

original: de yang bdag gis ni rdo rje gtsug tor gyi rgyud kyi sgrub thabs @70a * //
analyzed: de yang bdag gis ni rdo rje gtsug tor gyi rgyud kyi sgrub thabs @70a * //
translated: Moreover, in the sādhana of the Vajroṣṇīṣa Tantra,

original: su ni aom badzra h'um phat ces bya ba dang / aom rat not tra ta ma tram zhes bya ba la sogs pa las bskyed do //
analyzed: su ni aom badzra h'um phat ces bya ba dang / aom rat not tra ta ma tram zhes bya ba la sogs pa las bskyed do //
translated: it is generated from oṃ vajra hūṃ phaṭ and oṃ ratnoṭaṃ traṃ maṃ and so on.

original: 'dir ni 'di nyid kyi sngags rnams las bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir ni 'di nyid kyi sngags rnams las bskyed par bya'o //
translated: Here, it should be generated from the mantras of this very [sādhana].

original: ci'i phyir rgyud mi mthun pa'i phyir na som nyi za bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: ci'i phyir rgyud mi mthun pa'i phyir na som nyi za bar mi bya'o //
translated: Why? Because the tantras are not in agreement, one should not be doubtful.

original: bdag nyid kyi thugs kar kun du bzang po byang chub kyi sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su aom sarba aa p'a ya bi sho dha ni badzra h'um phat ces pa'i sngags phreng ba'i tshul du bkod la 'phros shing 'dus pa las rdo rje rtse lnga par
analyzed: bdag nyid kyi thugs kar kun du bzang po byang chub kyi sems zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su aom sarba aa p'a ya bi sho dha ni badzra h'um phat ces pa'i sngags phreng ba'i tshul du bkod la 'phros shing 'dus pa las rdo rje rtse lnga par
translated: In the center of a moon mandala in the heart of the Bhagavat, one should arrange the mantra garland in the form of a circle, saying, “Om sarva apāyaviśodhani vajra hūṃ phaṭ.”🔽From that, light radiates and gathers all the vajra realms of the body, speech, and mind of all the tathāgatas of the world systems of the ten directions.

original: gyur de las 'od 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i dbyings ji snyed pa thams cad bsdus nas rdo rje la thim pas brtan par gyur to //
analyzed: gyur de las 'od 'phros pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i dbyings ji snyed pa thams cad bsdus nas rdo rje la thim pas brtan par gyur to //
translated: Having gathered them, they dissolve into the vajra, and it becomes stable.

original: yang de las sku phra mo mang po 'phros shing 'dus pa las rdo rje sems dpa'i sku phyag rgya chen por gyur te /
analyzed: yang de las sku phra mo mang po 'phros shing 'dus pa las rdo rje sems dpa'i sku phyag rgya chen por gyur te /
translated: Again, many subtle bodies radiate from that and gather, becoming the great seal body of Vajrasattva.

original: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i thugs kan zhugs so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i thugs kan zhugs so //
translated: It enters into the heart of the Bhagavat Śākyamuni.

original: yang de nyid kyi thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du sngags kyi phreng ba rnams snga ma bzhin du bkod la sngags de nyid brjod pa las bskul zhing spyan drangs pa'i tshul gyis phyir bton te /
analyzed: yang de nyid kyi thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du sngags kyi phreng ba rnams snga ma bzhin du bkod la sngags de nyid brjod pa las bskul zhing spyan drangs pa'i tshul gyis phyir bton te /
translated: By reciting the mantra, it is invoked and drawn out in the manner of an invitation.🔽It emanates into the ten directions, and having acted for the welfare of beings in the manner of the twelve deeds, it reabsorbs.

original: phyogs bcur spros pas mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul gyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad nas slar 'dus pa las bdag gi mdun na bka' nod cing bzhugs pa la ;
analyzed: phyogs bcur spros pas mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi tshul gyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad nas slar 'dus pa las bdag gi mdun na bka' nod cing bzhugs pa la ;
translated: It remains in front, waiting for instructions.

original: de la cho 'phrul chen po bzhis byin gyis brlabs te /
analyzed: de la cho 'phrul chen po bzhis byin gyis brlabs te /
translated: It is empowered by the four great miracles.

original: snying gar rdo rje /
analyzed: snying gar rdo rje /
translated: The vajra is at the heart,

original: khar padma / dpral bar rin po che /
analyzed: khar padma / dpral bar rin po che /
translated: the lotus at the mouth, the jewel at the forehead,

original: spyi bor rgya gram bsam mo //
analyzed: spyi bor rgya gram bsam mo //
translated: and the crossed vajra at the crown.

original: de la yang dbang bskur te yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i dbu rgyan nam mkha' las byung ba mgo la bskon te /
analyzed: de la yang dbang bskur te yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i dbu rgyan nam mkha' las byung ba mgo la bskon te /
translated: Again, the empowerment is conferred. A precious wish-granting jewel arises from space and is placed on the head.

original: bdag gi rdo rje dang dril bu gnyis sri zhu'i tshul gyis lag par byin la /
analyzed: bdag gi rdo rje dang dril bu gnyis sri zhu'i tshul gyis lag par byin la /
translated: The vajra and bell are given to the hands in the manner of respect.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes lan gsum brjod de ming gi dbang bskur nas nyid kyi phrin las kyis bzhugs nas 'khor lo'i shar gyi rtsibs su padma zla ba'i steng du bzhugs su gsol lo //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes lan gsum brjod de ming gi dbang bskur nas nyid kyi phrin las kyis bzhugs nas 'khor lo'i shar gyi rtsibs su padma zla ba'i steng du bzhugs su gsol lo //
translated: Having conferred the name empowerment by repeating “Vajrasattva” three times, they remain in their own activity and are requested to remain on the eastern spoke of the wheel on a lotus and moon.🔽For the others, the mantra strings are arranged in the heart and emanate and reabsorb into the hand implements.🔽They stabilize that, and from that the form of the deity arises.🔽They emanate for the welfare of sentient beings, return, and remain in front.

original: gzhan rnams la yang dang po'i thugs ka'i sngags kyi phreng ba bkod pa'i 'phro 'du las phyag mtshan du gyur pa dang / de brtan par byas pa dang / de las sku phyag rgyar gyur pa dang / de sems can gyi don la spros nas slar byon te bdag gi mdun na gnas pa la cho 'phrul chen po bzhis byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
analyzed: gzhan rnams la yang dang po'i thugs ka'i sngags kyi phreng ba bkod pa'i 'phro 'du las phyag mtshan du gyur pa dang / de brtan par byas pa dang / de las sku phyag rgyar gyur pa dang / de sems can gyi don la spros nas slar byon te bdag gi mdun na gnas pa la cho 'phrul chen po bzhis byin gyis brlabs pa dang /
translated: They are empowered by the four great miracles.🔽The precious crown that arises from space is placed on their head, the hand implements are given into their hands, and the name empowerment is conferred.

original: nam mkha' las byung pa rin po che'i dbu rgyan mgo la bskon pa dang / @70b phyag mtshan lag tu byin pa dang / ming gi dbang bskur ba byas la nyid kyi phrin las kyi bzhugs sa gang yin par bzhugs su gsol lo //
analyzed: nam mkha' las byung pa rin po che'i dbu rgyan mgo la bskon pa dang / @70b phyag mtshan lag tu byin pa dang / ming gi dbang bskur ba byas la nyid kyi phrin las kyi bzhugs sa gang yin par bzhugs su gsol lo //
translated: They are requested to remain in their own activity.

original: de dag gis bskyed cing sku 'don pa'i sngags ni aom sarba karma a'a ba ra na ni bhasmim ku ru h'um phat ces pa las rgyal ba'i gtsug tor sku mdog mthing ga phyag drug pa dang po gnyis rin po che'i rgyal mtshan /
analyzed: de dag gis bskyed cing sku 'don pa'i sngags ni aom sarba karma a'a ba ra na ni bhasmim ku ru h'um phat ces pa las rgyal ba'i gtsug tor sku mdog mthing ga phyag drug pa dang po gnyis rin po che'i rgyal mtshan /
translated: From that, the Victor’s uṣṇīṣa is blue, with six arms. The first two hold a jeweled victory banner.

original: g-yas dbus ma na zhags pa g-yon rdo rje khu tshur sta zur du bstan pa ste /
analyzed: g-yas dbus ma na zhags pa g-yon rdo rje khu tshur sta zur du bstan pa ste /
translated: The middle right hand holds a lasso, the left vajra fist is displayed at the hip,

original: zhags pa be con 'dzin pa /🔽g-yas tha ma na rdo rje /
analyzed: zhags pa be con 'dzin pa / g-yas tha ma na rdo rje /
translated: holding a lasso and club.🔽The last right hand holds a vajra.

original: g-yon tha ma na padma'i steng na gtsug tor bsnams pa ste /
analyzed: g-yon tha ma na padma'i steng na gtsug tor bsnams pa ste /
translated: The last left hand holds a uṣṇīṣa on a lotus.

original: lho'i rtsibs steng du'o //
analyzed: lho'i rtsibs steng du'o //
translated: He is on the southern petal.

original: yang gtso bo'i thugs kar aom bhr'um bi n'a sha ya a'a pa ra na ni h'um phat /
analyzed: yang gtso bo'i thugs kar aom bhr'um bi n'a sha ya a'a pa ra na ni h'um phat /
translated: Again, oṃ bhrūṃ vināśaya aparāṇa hūṃ phaṭ is at the heart of the principal figure.

original: de las phyag rgya 'khor lo /
analyzed: de las phyag rgya 'khor lo /
translated: From that, the mudra is cakra.

original: de las brtan pa /
analyzed: de las brtan pa /
translated: From that, the firm one.

original: de las sku phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: de las sku phyag rgya'o //
translated: From that, the body is the seal.

original: de nyid kyi thugs kar sngags bkod pa dang / spyan drangs pa dang / bka' nod pa'i tshul du zhugs pa la dbu rgyan dang dbang bskur ba yang bya /
analyzed: de nyid kyi thugs kar sngags bkod pa dang / spyan drangs pa dang / bka' nod pa'i tshul du zhugs pa la dbu rgyan dang dbang bskur ba yang bya /
translated: At his heart, the mantra is arranged, and the [deity] is invited, and enters in the manner of receiving permission. Also, the crown and empowerment are conferred.

original: phyag rgya byin pa ni 'khor lo byin te /
analyzed: phyag rgya byin pa ni 'khor lo byin te /
translated: The bestowal of the seal is the bestowal of the wheel.

original: gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba zhes so //
analyzed: gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba zhes so //
translated: It is called the uṣṇīṣa cakravartin.

original: de nas nub kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi padma dang zla ba'i steng du sku mdog dmar po bzhugs so //
analyzed: de nas nub kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi padma dang zla ba'i steng du sku mdog dmar po bzhugs so //
translated: Then, on the lotus and moon seat of the spoke of the western wheel, [the deity] resides with a red colored body.

original: aom drum bi sho dha ya sarba a'a ba ra n'a ni h'um phat ces pa las rnam par rgyal ba'i gtsug tor sku mdog ser po phyag bzhi g-yas kyi dang po na rgyal mtshan gyi mgul ba dan gyis mtshan pa bsnams /
analyzed: aom drum bi sho dha ya sarba a'a ba ra n'a ni h'um phat ces pa las rnam par rgyal ba'i gtsug tor sku mdog ser po phyag bzhi g-yas kyi dang po na rgyal mtshan gyi mgul ba dan gyis mtshan pa bsnams /
translated: From oṃ druṃ viśodhaya sarvāvaraṇāni hūṃ phaṭ, the uṣṇīṣa vijaya arises. He is yellow colored, with four faces, and holds a banner marked with a pennant at the tip of the right first [hand].

original: g-yon dang po na dbu rgyan /
analyzed: g-yon dang po na dbu rgyan /
translated: The first left [hand] holds a crown.

original: de'i 'og ma gnyis kyi g-yas pas ni dam pa sbyin pa'o //
analyzed: de'i 'og ma gnyis kyi g-yas pas ni dam pa sbyin pa'o //
translated: The two below that, the right [hand] makes the gesture of granting wishes.

original: g-yon pas ni padma'i steng na gtsug tor bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: g-yon pas ni padma'i steng na gtsug tor bsnams pa'o //
translated: The left [hand] holds an uṣṇīṣa upon a lotus.

original: de ni byang gi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su gnas pa'o //
analyzed: de ni byang gi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su gnas pa'o //
translated: It is located on the northern spoke of the wheel.

original: yang na g-yon nas bskor ba'o //
analyzed: yang na g-yon nas bskor ba'o //
translated: Or else, it is in the counterclockwise direction.

original: aom dzva la dzva la dha ka dha ka ha na ha na sarba aa ba ra n'a ni h'um phat ces pa las gzi brjid gtsug tor sku mdog dmar skya phyag gnyis na nyi ma rin po ches mtshan pa bsnams pa me'i mtshams sna bzhugs pa'o //
analyzed: aom dzva la dzva la dha ka dha ka ha na ha na sarba aa ba ra n'a ni h'um phat ces pa las gzi brjid gtsug tor sku mdog dmar skya phyag gnyis na nyi ma rin po ches mtshan pa bsnams pa me'i mtshams sna bzhugs pa'o //
translated: Om jvala jvala dhaka dhaka hana hana sarva avaranaani hum phat. From this arises Ushnisha Tejas, red-tinged, holding a sun marked with a jewel in both hands, located in the southeast.

original: aom sum sa ra sa ra pra sa ra pra sa ra sarba a'a wa ra n'a ni h'um phat ces pa las gtsug tor gdugs dkar po sku mdog dkar po phyag na gdugs dkar po bsnams pa dbang ldan gyi phyogs su'o //
analyzed: aom sum sa ra sa ra pra sa ra pra sa ra sarba a'a wa ra n'a ni h'um phat ces pa las gtsug tor gdugs dkar po sku mdog dkar po phyag na gdugs dkar po bsnams pa dbang ldan gyi phyogs su'o //
translated: Om sum sara sara prasara prasara sarva avaranaani hum phat. From this arises Ushnisha Chattra, white, holding a white parasol in her hands, in the northeast.

original: aom h'um ha ra ha ra sarba a'a ba ra n'a ni h'um phat ces pa las gtsug tor rnam par mthong ba sku mdog dmar skya phyag g-yon snying gar mdzub mo bsgreng /
analyzed: aom h'um ha ra ha ra sarba a'a ba ra n'a ni h'um phat ces pa las gtsug tor rnam par mthong ba sku mdog dmar skya phyag g-yon snying gar mdzub mo bsgreng /
translated: Om hum hara hara sarva avaranaani hum phat. From this arises Ushnisha Vipashyana, red-tinged, with the left hand at the heart holding a threatening forefinger,

original: g-yas ral gri bsnams pa nub byang mtshams su'o //
analyzed: g-yas ral gri bsnams pa nub byang mtshams su'o //
translated: and the right hand holding a sword, in the northwest.

original: aom h'um phat sarba a'a ba ra n'a ni spho ta ya h'um phat ces pa las /🔽@71a * // gtsug tor rnam par 'joms pa sku mdog nag po g-yon mdzub mo bsgrengs /
analyzed: aom h'um phat sarba a'a ba ra n'a ni spho ta ya h'um phat ces pa las / @71a * // gtsug tor rnam par 'joms pa sku mdog nag po g-yon mdzub mo bsgrengs /
translated: Oṃ hūṃ phaṭ sarvāvaraṇāni sphuṭaya hūṃ phaṭ.🔽From this, the uṣṇīṣa conqueror is black, with the left index finger extended,

original: g-yas be con bsnams pa yid tsam khros pa'o //
analyzed: g-yas be con bsnams pa yid tsam khros pa'o //
translated: and the right hand holding a club, slightly wrathful.

original: de nas de dag gi yo byad bshad ces pa ni mchod pa'i lha mo'o //
analyzed: de nas de dag gi yo byad bshad ces pa ni mchod pa'i lha mo'o //
translated: Then, the explanation of their articles is the offering goddesses.

original: aom sarbba aa p'a ya bi sho dha ni dha ma dha ma dhu pa ya h'um phat /
analyzed: aom sarbba aa p'a ya bi sho dha ni dha ma dha ma dhu pa ya h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ sarvapāpaviśodhani dhūma dhūma dhūpayā hūṃ phaṭ.

original: ces pa bdug pa ma'o ;
analyzed: ces pa bdug pa ma'o ;
translated: From this, the incense goddess.🔽Oṃ sarvadurgatipariśodhani puṣpa vilokani hūṃ phaṭ.

original: / aom sarba du rga ti bi sho dha ni pushpa bi lo ka ni h'um phat ces pa las me tog ma'o //
analyzed: / aom sarba du rga ti bi sho dha ni pushpa bi lo ka ni h'um phat ces pa las me tog ma'o //
translated: From this, the flower goddess.🔽Oṃ sarvapāpaviśodhani jñānālokakari hūṃ phaṭ.

original: aom sarba aa p'a ya bi sho dha ni dzny'a a'a lo ka ka ri h'um phat ces pa las mar me ma'o //
analyzed: aom sarba aa p'a ya bi sho dha ni dzny'a a'a lo ka ka ri h'um phat ces pa las mar me ma'o //
translated: From this, the lamp goddess.🔽Oṃ sarvadurgativinasanagandhe pataya hūṃ phaṭ.

analyzed: aom sarba aa p'a ya ga ti ga ha na bi n'a sha ni h'um ho: phat ces pa las dril bu'o //

analyzed: de nas sta gon la gnas pa yang bya'o //

original: de nas nang par nyi ma shar nas thig gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas nang par nyi ma shar nas thig gdab par bya'o //

analyzed: thig kyang ye shes kyi thig dang las kyi thig go //

analyzed: de la ye shes kyi thig ni tshon sna lnga ru btsos pa shin tu legs par byas pa /

translated: The ledge is

analyzed: de'i steng du sna tshogs padma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa'o //

analyzed: de la ni /

analyzed: de nas dbang ldan nas brtsams nas dkar po dang dmar po dang sngon po dang ljang gu dang / nang du ser por shes par bya'o //

original: de nas lha dgod par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas lha dgod par bya ste /

translated: One should place the lord, the master of the nine knots, Śākyamuni, born into the Śākya clan.

original: de ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: de ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //

analyzed: dpa' bo de yi spyan sngar bri // zhes bya ba ni shar du bri ba ste /

analyzed: me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin no //

analyzed: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes las sku sprul te dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo ni 'gro ba'i rgyud la bskor la /

analyzed: @72b thugs rje thabs kyi 'khor lo ni khams gsum gyi nang du sgyur ba'i phyir ro //

analyzed: g-yas su rgyal ba'i gtsug tor te //
translated: The Victor's uṣṇīṣa should be drawn to the right.

original: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas ni lho phyogs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyi g-yas ni lho phyogs te /
translated: The Bhagavān's right is the south.

original: g-yon du rnam par rgyal ba bri //
analyzed: g-yon du rnam par rgyal ba bri //

analyzed: zhes pa ni g-yon ni bcom ldan 'das kyi byang phyogs te /
